VTKm_ENABLE_TESTING:BOOL=OFF
VTKm_ENABLE_TESTING_LIBRARY:BOOL=OFF
VTKm_ENABLE_RENDERING:BOOL=ON
VTKm_USE_64BIT_IDS:BOOL=OFF
VTKm_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION:BOOL=ON
VTKm_USE_DEFAULT_TYPES_FOR_VTK:BOOL=ON
BUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=OFF

# upate this as needed
CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=C:/A_VisIt/GIT/visit-deps/windowsbuild/MSVC2017/vtkm/v1.7.0
